DEISM Documentation

Diffraction Enhanced Image Source Method - Arbitrary Room Geometry (DEISM-ARG)

DEISM is a Python package for room acoustics simulation that incorporates local diffraction effects around transducers using the image source method.

Quick Links

  • Academic publications - Jump to all publications

  • Main Paper - Main JASA paper

  • Directivity Formulation - Directivity formulation paper

  • Arbitrary Geometries - Arbitrary geometries paper
